Nov. 21, 1992 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (1st Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (First Section) 10 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-1st-section
Test Piece Contest
The Land of the Long White Cloud - Aotearoa
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - flugel Gwaun cae Gurwen. Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £40. 8 bands competed
March 4, 2011, 9:49 a.m. July 3, 2020, 9:18 a.m.
